text:
Welcome to your work space!

A donor has decided to build an aquarium in town. The donor wants the front entrance to contain a large tank with up to 30 colorful large fish (up to 2.5 pounds or 16 inches long) to make the aquarium exciting and inviting. The donor will pay for all materials and upkeep.

A team of students (you and your friends) have been invited to help design this tank.

You can only edit tiles that are within your workspace to the right. If you lose a question tile, you can get a fresh copy of it below.

  • Click on the dots in the top right corner of the desired question tile and drag it into your own workspace.
  • Answer each question in your workspace by typing in the tile with the question in it.

Question 1

Write a few sentences telling the donor the volume of water needed for the tank and explain how you got your solution.

{Write your answer here}

Question 2

Recommend what size filtration system to buy. You can round your recommendation to 25 gallons.

{Write your answer here}
